com.safenetinc.jcprov

Class CK_MECHANISM

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.safenetinc.jcprov.CK_MECHANISM

  • public class CK_MECHANISM
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to specify a particular mechanism and any parameters that it takes.

    Further information is provided in the PKCS#11 standard and the Programmers Manual.

    See Also:
    CKM

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      CK_MECHANISM_TYPE mechanism
      the type of the mechanism.
      long parameterLen
      lenght of the data referenced by pParameter
      java.lang.Object pParameter
      parameter for the mechanism

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CK_MECHANISM()
      Values are initialised to 0 or null
      CK_MECHANISM(CK_MECHANISM_TYPE mechanism)
      Simplified constructor for mechanisms which have either no parameter or a default parameter.
      CK_MECHANISM(CK_MECHANISM_TYPE mechanism, java.lang.Object pParameter)
      Simplified constructor where the parameterLen is determined
      CK_MECHANISM(CK_MECHANISM_TYPE mechanism, java.lang.Object pParameter, long parameterLen)
      Values are initialised as specified

    • Method Detail

      • getMechanismParameterSize

        public static long getMechanismParameterSize(java.lang.Object pParameter)
        Get the size of a CK_MECHANISM parameter. This method is here for CK_MECHANISM to use because if it was written in java then there would be a circular dependency between this package and the package holding the CK_ parameter classes.
